name: elevatorsaga
description: Elevator Saga =================== The elevator programming game

scripts.build: esbuild app.js base.js challenges.js elevator.js fitness.js fitnessworker.js floor.js interfaces.js movable.js presenters.js user.js world.js --bundle --outdir=dist
scripts.copy-static: cp -r font-awesome-4.1-1.0 dist/ && cp -r libs dist/ && cp *.html dist/ && cp *.css dist/
